system.description:
Somehow, it seems like everything's fallen onto your shoulders. You didn't ask for this, but you're here, and no one else is. Rise up, Chosen One.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Chosen One, everyone must agree that you are important to the success of the Fellowship.

The Chosen One starts with Destiny Child.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.chosen-one.Item.XfZHWArKNgEBGQbO]{DESTINY CHILD}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.chosen-one.Item.3OfOuUYv2tbJaZST]{ANCIENT ALLIES}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.chosen-one.Item.jOIOCrSGH80RJyP9]{BUT THE PROPHECY!?}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.chosen-one.Item.bBRA6VGjFjGIq30h]{ENDLESS DETERMINATION}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.chosen-one.Item.g1XIgFAnbNWc1C4E]{FATE'S PUPPET}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.chosen-one.Item.0wZ8H5E16wxBRtb0]{I CAN DO THIS}

advancements.name: Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
Take a Custom Move from any Basic playbook.
